text: Heo Young-ji (born August 30, 1994), known as Youngji, is a South Korean singer, actress and television personality. She is best known as a member of girl group Kara after winning the TV show Kara Project in 2014. Heo began her solo music career in August 2017 with her first single, "Memory Clock". ==Singles== Title Year Peak chart positions Sales Album Title Year KOR Gaon Sales Album "Memory Clock" 2017 — rowspan="2" rowspan="2" "Longing" 2017 — "—" denotes songs that did not chart or were not released in that region. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1994 births Category:K-pop singers Category:Kara (South Korean group) members Category:Living people Category:South Korean movie actors Category:South Korean singers Category:South Korean television actors
